arts.ttl: Hearts drop points as they hit back twice for share of spoils at St Mirren
arts.sum: Hearts saw their lead at the top of the Scottish Premiership cut to six points as they were held to a 2-2 draw by St Mirren in Paisley.

arts.ttl: Hearts nab improbable point in St Mirren comeback as Claudio Braga stars amid VAR mega drama â€“ 5 talking points
arts.sum: The Jambos were held to a 2-2 draw in Pailsey with Celtic cutting their lead at the Premiership summit to six points

arts.ttl: Hearts could see title hopes boosted as St Mirren eye a bigger prize
arts.sum: Whisper it but Stephen Robinson may have bigger fish to fry than a Premiership clash in Paisley

St Mirren host Hearts in a midweek meeting in the Scottish Premiership, a few months after the Buddies beat the Jambos in the Scottish League Cup round of 16 on penalties in Paisley. St Mirren have w...
